contents.name: FlowRateLs
contents.description: Flow rate measured in liters per second.

contents.name: Temperature
contents.description: Temperature of the fluid passing through the sensor, measured in degrees Celsius.

contents.name: Pressure
contents.description: Pressure of the fluid at the sensor location, measured in bar.

contents.name: OperationalStatus
contents.description: The operational state of the flow sensor.

contents.name: Monitors
contents.description: Relationship indicating that the flow sensor monitors the motorized valve.

contents.name: IsMonitoredBy
contents.description: Relationship indicating that the flow sensor is monitored by a control unit.
